metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass the arm-ttk test, 'Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded'. Instead the `workspace-location` derived from the log analytics workspace is used.
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
the log analytics workspace enabled for Microsoft Sentinel

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Attack Surface Conntector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cyfirma DeCYFIR/DeTCT Alerts] data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR/DeTCT API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

graphQueries.legend: Cyfirma Attack Surface Domain-IP Reputation Logs

graphQueries.legend: Cyfirma Attack Surface Open Ports Alerts Logs

Total Cyfirma Attack Surface Domain IP Vulnerability Alerts logs received

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaASCertificatesAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaASCertificatesAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaASConfigurationAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaASConfigurationAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title']

| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title']

| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title']

schema.name: CyfirmaASCertificatesAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provide the ceritificates data from the Cyfirma.

schema.name: CyfirmaASCloudWeaknessAlerts_CL

schema.description: This custom table provides Domain IP Vulnerability data from Cyfirma.

schema.description: This custom table provides Open Ports data from Cyfirma.
